summary: A Skyrim lets play/cinema about a Family in Riften. Somebody has a secret!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at doing any kind of video game recording. For my first time I don't think it was all that bad. I still have a lot to learn hopefully i get better as the series goes on. I wanted to upload it on Nexus so hopefully I can get some tips and pointers like i said I'm fairly new to this so any comments o what you think is welcome.

They story is about your typical Riften family only somebody in the family has a deep dark secret....

This is only the Intro video to the series

Link to watch the story. Thank you!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AYnvxIBKzk
author: MMFT93
